cc.printing.awt.image

Class AwtForImagePrinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • cc.printing.awt.image.AwtForImagePrinter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChineseCharacterTypePrinter

    public class AwtForImagePrinter
extends Object
implements ChineseCharacterTypePrinter
    圖片活字遞迴列印工具。接收圖片活字結構（ImageMovableType），依結構遞迴找出字體並列印在Graphics2D上。
    Author:
    Ihc
